objects.specification: A natural stone textured floor with a mottled pattern of browns and greens reminiscent of a prehistoric forest floor. The surface is matte and slightly rough to suggest natural materials.
Smooth plaster walls with a subtle natural stone texture, painted in a soft beige tone that evokes an earthy environment. The surface has gentle irregularities to mimic natural rock formations.
Smooth plaster walls with a subtle natural stone texture, painted in a soft beige tone that evokes an earthy environment. The surface has gentle irregularities to mimic natural rock formations.
Smooth plaster walls with a subtle natural stone texture, painted in a soft beige tone that evokes an earthy environment. The surface has gentle irregularities to mimic natural rock formations.
Smooth plaster walls with a subtle natural stone texture, painted in a soft beige tone that evokes an earthy environment. The surface has gentle irregularities to mimic natural rock formations.

A teacher's desk featuring a larger rectangular solid wood tabletop with robust legs and integrated modesty panel. The design exudes authority and stability, with a rich brown stain finish and a smooth surface. The desk is spacious enough for teaching materials and electronic devices.

A large wall-mounted chalkboard with a matte black surface framed by dark wood. The frame has subtle carved details that add a classic academic touch. The writing surface is slightly textured for chalk adherence and easy erasing.

A tall wooden bookshelf with multiple open shelves, constructed from the same warm-toned wood as the desks. The shelves are filled with books of varying sizes, all with dinosaur themed covers. The bookshelf has a simple, sturdy design with a slightly distressed finish.

A large dinosaur footprint decal with a dark olive green color, textured to resemble vinyl material. The imprint shows detailed toe pads and claws, and the edges are slightly irregular to suggest natural wear. It sits flush with the floor surface.

A large rectangular window with a natural wood frame and translucent curtains in a soft beige fabric. The curtains hang from a simple rod and can be drawn to control natural light. The window provides ample daylight and a view outside.

A potted plant with broad tropical green leaves arranged in a radial pattern. The leaves have glossy surfaces and natural variegation. The plant is in a simple ceramic pot with a matte finish and earthy color.

A life-size dinosaur skeleton model composed of elongated cylindrical bones connected by spherical joints, arranged to resemble an iconic dinosaur posture. The bones have a weathered gray texture with subtle surface variations to mimic fossilized remains. The form is anatomically suggestive and detailed.

A life-size dinosaur skeleton model composed of elongated cylindrical bones connected by spherical joints, arranged to resemble an iconic dinosaur posture. The bones have a weathered gray texture with subtle surface variations to mimic fossilized remains. The form is anatomically suggestive and detailed.

A life-size dinosaur skeleton model composed of elongated cylindrical bones connected by spherical joints, arranged to resemble an iconic dinosaur posture. The bones have a weathered gray texture with subtle surface variations to mimic fossilized remains. The form is anatomically suggestive and detailed.

A wall-mounted educational poster printed on matte paper, featuring colorful illustrations of dinosaur species and informative fact panels. The poster has a thin frame and vibrant colors that stand out against the wall. The typography is clear and educational in style.

A ceiling-mounted light fixture with a round metal frame and frosted glass diffuser. The design is minimalist and modern, providing bright, even illumination. The metal elements have a brushed steel finish.

A ceiling-mounted light fixture with a round metal frame and frosted glass diffuser. The design is minimalist and modern, providing bright, even illumination. The metal elements have a brushed steel finish.

children.specification: A student chair with a wooden frame and a padded seat and backrest upholstered in forest green fabric. The legs are straight and sturdy, and the backrest is slightly reclined for comfort. The overall style complements the wooden desk with an earthy and natural aesthetic.

objects.specification: A rectangular student desk crafted from solid wood with smooth surface, featuring a flat tabletop supported by sturdy rectangular legs. The design is simple and functional, with an earthy brown finish that evokes a natural, prehistoric atmosphere. The edges are slightly rounded for safety and visual softness.
